word: G2139 - εὐπερίστατος - euperístatos - yoo-per-is'-tat-os - Which doth so easily beset

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Which doth so easily beset

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G2095 and a derivative of a presumed compound of G4012 and G2476; well standing around, that is, (a competitor) thwarting (a racer) in every direction (figuratively of sin in general): - which doth so easily beset.
